translation.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.
translation.ogl: All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated
translation.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler. Find out more about cookies
translation.emailIfProblems: Send us a message
translation.responseTime: We aim to get back to you within 5 days
translation.chatDown: The web chat service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
translation.noAgentsAvailable: No agents are available, please try again later.
translation.allAgentsBusy: All our web chat agents are busy helping other people. Please try again later or contact us using one of the ways above.
translation.chatClosed: Web chat is now closed.\nOpening hours are {{courtOpeningHour}}.
translation.chatAlreadyOpen: A web chat window is already open.
